      • onCircle

        public boolean onCircle(double x,
                        double y)
        Checks if a point is on the circle (if a point was drawn and the circle was as well, the point would be on the unfilled edge)
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the point
        y - y coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        if a point is on the edge of the circle (the line drawn)
